Summary: Noticed Red lights first and the hovering and dancing - no rythem to lights
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Cranford New Jersey (Union County) Longitude 70.4? I looked out the 2nd floor window facing North and saw it....thought my eyes were playing tricks. So I stepped away, rubbed my eyes, put on eye glasses and it was still there! My benchmark were the planes flying over-head. We live in flight-pattern for Newark Airport. THIS WAS DEFINATELY LOWER THAN THE PLANES. Also when the planes flow over ~ it seemed to dissapear. I saw red lights at first. Then it danced, and lights blinking, BUT no rythem to the pattern. It moved in un-normal ways. Bobbing and swooping. IT WAS SO BEAUTIFUL! It lasted almost 25 min....so I had time to walk away and make sure my eyes were not playing tricks on me. The very strange thing was the color behind the tall tress ~ they were illuminated from the back in shades of gray and white. like a "black & white" photo. I am so very lucky to have witnessed this....i have never seen anything like it in my entire life. It also has changed my life and I will never lookk at anyhting in life the same ever again. Thanks. Hope this helps with your research
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cranford
This sighting has never been favorited.
